My name is Garen, both \u003ca class=\"mention\" href=\"/u/kiernan\"\u003e@Kiernan\u003c/a\u003e and i are a part of the University of Kansas’s Robotics Organization, or KURO for short. We have a swerve drive base that we intend to get up and running, but lack a few essential parts. We were wondering if any teams around the Mo-Kan area, or even Kansas in general, have a spare Rio 1 and a Pigeon 2, although the Pigeon is a lesser priority. We are more than willing to come and pick up, but can cover shipping if need be.\u003cbr\u003e\nThanks ever so much!\u003c/p\u003e","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":5,"updated_at":"2024-09-05T02:51:37.359Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":3,"reads":248,"readers_count":247,"score":79.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":470735,"topic_slug":"university-of-kansas-robotics-students-requesting-parts","display_username":"Garen Castleberry","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":59530,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"like the only 3465 member here"},"post_url":"/t/university-of-kansas-robotics-students-requesting-parts/470735/1","custom_user_title":"like the only 3465 member here","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3420803,"name":"jedgar6","username":"jedgar6","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/jedgar6/{size}/200602_2.png","created_at":"2024-09-05T04:16:44.659Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eThis is kind of a big ask, especially since preseason has started.
